name: Fifty Games
description:
Fifty Games is a game made in one day by Harrison Gowland, in an effort to beat Jonas Tyroller's 50 Games in One Day challenge. They only made it as far as thirty-three games, but now you can play the absolute trainwreck of a disaster that is Harrison Gowland's Fifty Games (thirty-three games). 

Containing FIFTY WHOLE GAMES (thirty-three games) including:

- Two variations on the SAME QUIZ!

- A one-button DATING SIM!

- Three games that are THE EXACT SAME BUT THE CAMERA WAS MOVED!

- A functioning* VENDING MACHINE!

(*The vending machine is set up to dispense four vague coloured cylinders.)

Download Fifty Games (thirty-three games) today!
